definitions.definition: To bring (the body or part of it) into contact with a substance that causes illness (a pathogen ), so that the pathogen begins to act on the body; (of a pathogen) to come into contact with (a body or body part) and begin to act on it.
examples: Not everyone will be infected when an epidemic strikes.

definitions.definition: To contaminate (an object or substance) with a pathogen.
To make somebody enthusiastic about one's own passion, or to communicate a feeling to others, or a feeling communicating itself to others.
examples: Her passion for dancing has infected me.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To bring (the body or part of it) into contact with a substance that causes illness (a pathogen ), so that the pathogen begins to act on the body; (of a pathogen) to come into contact with (a body or body part) and begin to act on it.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To contaminate (an object or substance) with a pathogen.
( transitive ) To make somebody enthusiastic about one's own passion, or to communicate a feeling to others, or a feeling communicating itself to others.
